original_text: And Moses said to the judges of Israel, “Each of you kill those of his men who have yoked themselves to Baal of Peor.”
korean_text: 모세가 이스라엘 재판관들에게 이르되 너희는 각각 바알브올에게 가담한 사람들을 죽이라 하니라

sentences.original_text: And Moses said to the judges of Israel
Each of you kill those of his men
who have yoked themselves to Baal of Peor
